title: The Heatwave lasted four days
creator_credit: Douglas Jackson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A few meters of film, the tempting lure of several thousand dollars, and a television-news cameraman with a weakness for wine, women and cars becomes an accomplice in crime. In this fast-moving murder feature, which links intrigue with intrigue, we witness the progressive ruination of a man who can find no way out.
